com.xamoom.android.mapping.ContentBlocks

Class ContentBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xamoom.android.mapping.ContentBlocks.ContentBlock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentBlockType0, ContentBlockType1, ContentBlockType2, ContentBlockType3, ContentBlockType4, ContentBlockType5, ContentBlockType6, ContentBlockType7, ContentBlockType8, ContentBlockType9

    public class ContentBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for mapping contentBlocks received from the xamoom-cloud-api. Display the text and set the font-style to the systemfont. The text is html formatted. So you have to display it right and you have to take care of different font-sizes and other text-stylings.
    See Also:
    ContentBlock, Style
